name: TriviaFight
0:
”Alexa, open Trivia Fight”
”Alexa, start Trivia Fight”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trivia fight
des: Here is finally the first interactive trivia game for Alexa. Challenge your friends in an incredible culture game. Every day we add new questions to improve the gaming experience. What are you waiting for? Challenge your friends, think about the answer and above all .... Fight !!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
